subject: Thank you for your recent loan request, we are ready to give a loan for a low month payment
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
$328,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this short form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://zdqrtx.com/
